resources.string: \n Try out this application to find Masjid around you or anywhere around the world. \n
Don\'t have an account yet? Signup
Click here to navigate to this masjid
Your GPS is disabled, do you want to enable your GPS ?

About Us: 
 
 We are a group of young and enthusiastic developers. At Genutek, we aim to create good, creative and effective applications for mobile and desktop platforms. 
 Genutek is a new startup which was established on 1st January 2017 with just $200 investment, and Find Me Masjid is our first live application on android platform. 
 We are doing our ultimate best to add more features to this application and develop more application in near future. 
 We need your encouragement, contribution and support to keep us moving forward. 
 Please remember us in your prayers. JazakAllah Khair. 
 
 
 Please share your valuable comments, suggestions or feedback at.. 
 find.me.masjid@gmail.com

Your comments and suggestions holds a great value for us. They drive us in the right direction of what you want. So, please share your valuable comments, suggestions or feedback at.. 
 
 find.me.masjid@gmail.com
Problem occurred while finding location. Make sure location is correct.\n Provide more details of your location. e.g. Aal Al Bait, Damascus
watch ads and get 1 support point
visit support page for more ways to contribute
No Internet connection found. Active internet connection is required to find location.
No Ads available to watch. Please again try later
Thanks a lot for your support.
Contribute to our cause by earning support points
A quick guide to use this application \n Find Me Masjid offers multiple ways to search Masjid
You can search masjid near to your location by tapping the GPS icon in tool bar - requires GPS
Find Me Masjid provides multiple ways to search masjid around you
Tap and hold anywhere on the map to find masjid around that location.
You can hold and drag the location marker any where on the map to find masjid around that location.
You can search masjid any where around the globe by providing the address in the search box.
